en.htu_container: <div style='background-color:#f0f8ff; border-radius:10px; padding:1.2em 1.5em; margin-bottom:1.5em; border:1px solid #e0e0e0;'>
htu_steps: Select Language and Tone: Choose your preferred input and output language (English, French, Spanish, German, Hindi, or Chinese). Then select the tone of response: formal, simplified, or kid-friendly.

Upload a Medical Image: Upload an image such as an X-ray, skin photo, or eye scan. The app will automatically identify the image type, adopt the appropriate medical expert role, and provide a structured analysis.

Analyze a Lab Report (PDF): Upload a lab report in PDF format. The app extracts and summarizes key findings, then presents the results in your selected language. You can also listen to the AI-generated summary.

Use Voice Input: Speak your question in any supported language. The app will transcribe your voice, translate it into English for analysis, and respond with both text and speech in your chosen language.
Ask Follow-Up Questions: Use the integrated chatbot to continue asking related questions. It retains memory of previous interactions for better context-aware responses.
Describe Symptoms for Diagnosis: Enter your symptoms, medical history, age, and gender. The app will generate a report with possible differential diagnoses and suggestions.

Disclaimer: This application is intended for educational and informational use only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult a licensed healthcare provider for medical concerns.
en.gemini_pdf_analysis_spinner: The AI physician is reviewing the report... Please wait.
en.gemini_pdf_analysis_error: An error occurred during AI analysis:
en.page1_subheader: A friendly AI assistant that explains medical images and reports.
en.htu_1: Fill out the report below (some symptoms are at least required)
en.htu_2: Check the summary of the report
en.htu_3: Submit the report (None of the provided data are saved or shared)
en.ask_image_question: Ask a question about the uploaded image...
en.ask_pdf_question: Ask a question about the PDF report...
en.voice_instruction: Record a voice question and get medical assistance.
en.voice_input: Click to record your voice question
en.ask_another: Ask another question by recording your voice above.
en.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you today?
en.no_response: The server does not respond or is overloaded with requests... Try again.
en.no_diagnostic: No diagnostic yet. Please fill out the report and click SUBMIT above.
en.disclaimer: Disclaimer:This is an AI-generated analysis for educational and informational purposes only. It is NOT a substitute for a professional medical diagnosis. Please consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns.
en.hist_example: Example: gone to an outdoor music festival in North America...
en.exam_example: Example: petechial lesions on the palms(Tiny red or purple spots on the palms)...
en.submit_warning: Please, enter at least some symptoms before submission.
en.caution_message: Please be aware that while the app is designed to assist medical decision-making and check symptoms, the final diagnosis should be made by a licensed medical professional.
en.gemini_image_analysis_disclaimer: **For Educational Use Only.** This tool uses a general-purpose AI and is not a certified medical device. Do not use it for self-diagnosis. Always consult a real doctor.
en.gemini_image_analysis_error_key: Please make sure you have a GOOGLE_API_KEY in your .env file in the root directory.
en.gemini_image_analysis_spinner: The AI expert is examining the image... Please wait.
en.gemini_image_analysis_error: An error occurred during AI analysis:

de.htu_container: <div style='background-color:#f0f8ff; border-radius:10px; padding:1.2em 1.5em; margin-bottom:1.5em; border:1px solid #e0e0e0;'>
htu_steps: Sprache und Ton auswÃ¤hlen: WÃ¤hle deine bevorzugte Eingabe- und Ausgabesprache (Englisch, FranzÃ¶sisch, Spanisch, Deutsch, Hindi oder Chinesisch). Danach den gewÃ¼nschten Antwortton: formell, vereinfacht oder kinderfreundlich.

Medizinisches Bild hochladen: Lade ein Bild hoch, z.â€¯B. ein RÃ¶ntgenbild, Hautfoto oder Augen-Scan. Die App erkennt automatisch den Bildtyp, nimmt die entsprechende medizinische Expertenrolle ein und liefert eine strukturierte Analyse.

Laborbericht analysieren (PDF): Lade einen Laborbericht im PDF-Format hoch. Die App extrahiert und fasst die wichtigsten Ergebnisse zusammen und zeigt diese in der gewÃ¤hlten Sprache an. Du kannst dir die KI-Zusammenfassung auch anhÃ¶ren.

Spracheingabe verwenden: Sprich deine Frage in einer der unterstÃ¼tzten Sprachen. Die App transkribiert, Ã¼bersetzt ins Englische zur Analyse und antwortet per Text und Sprache in deiner ausgewÃ¤hlten Sprache.
Folgefragen stellen: Verwende den integrierten Chatbot, um weitere zusammenhÃ¤ngende Fragen zu stellen. FrÃ¼here Interaktionen werden gespeichert, um kontextbezogene Antworten zu ermÃ¶glichen.
Symptome zur Diagnose eingeben: Gib deine Symptome, Krankengeschichte, dein Alter und Geschlecht ein. Die App erstellt einen Bericht mit mÃ¶glichen Differenzialdiagnosen und Empfehlungen.

Haftungsausschluss: Diese App dient ausschlieÃŸlich Bildungs- und Informationszwecken. Sie ersetzt keine professionelle medizinische Beratung. Wende dich bei gesundheitlichen Problemen immer an medizinisches Fachpersonal.
